title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
**ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set**

**Product Description:**

Get the job done with the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set, featuring two versatile hammers designed to tackle a variety of tasks. This set includes:

* 1 x Mini Stubby Claw Hammer (8 OZ)
* 1 x Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer (16 OZ)

**Key Features:**

* High carbon steel hammer heads with heat treatment for added strength and durability
* Polished finish with rust-preventative clear coating for corrosion resistance
* Ergonomic rubber handles with TPR coating for a comfortable grip
* Non-slip, textured surface for improved control
* Fiberglass construction for reduced vibration and shock absorption
* Glue feed technology for enhanced performance

**Performance:**

* Drive nails with confidence and precision
* Pull nails with maximum leverage and ease
* Concentrated force for efficient striking
* Robust design for heavy-duty use

**Design and Handling:**

* Well-balanced weight for smooth, controlled swings
* Easy handling and convenient operation
* Hang hole for easy storage and organization

**Applications:**

* Ideal for all hammering and clawing tasks
* Suitable for DIY projects, construction, and carpentry

**Product Specifications:**

* Hammer Head Material: High Carbon Steel
* Handle Material: Rubber with TPR Coating
* Handle Construction: Fiberglass
* Weight: 8 OZ (Mini Stubby Claw Hammer) and 16 OZ (Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer)
* Dimensions: (Please refer to product packaging for exact dimensions)

**Order Your ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set Today:**

Experience the reliability and performance of ZUZUAN hammers. Order now and get ready to tackle your next project with confidence.
